recipe.name: House Fresh-Grind Spice Mix
recipe.notes: Based loosely on a grinder mixture we got while staying in Italy in 2004. There it was labeled "per bruscetta" and contained mostly the same things.
recipe.preparation:
Mix ingredients to roughly the same proportion save for the dill which should be used no more than a third. I often go short on the fennel as well as it can be a jarring note at times.
In a grinder this has a tendency to separate out with the larger corns of pepper and red pepper flakes hanging about. Its best to re-integrate the contents of a grinder when about a third is left.
